clips.name: Scene_1.1
clips.description: We open on a body shot with kidneys on display. Next to body, a world map appears

clips.name: Scene_2.1
clips.description: Kidneys become more in focus. Cut to a blood vessel environment. Stop to rotate Gd-IgA1 around a pivot point.

clips.name: Scene_3.1.1.1
clips.description: More antibodies enter and are labelled anti-Gd-IgA1 autoantibodies (Title: ‘HIT 2’).

clips.name: Scene_3.1.2
clips.description: User pulls sequence slider to form immune complex.

clips.name: Scene_3.1.3
clips.description: Post-sequence slider, the voiceover explain

clips.name: Scene_3.3
clips.description: We transition to cross section of the glomerulus and show immune complex deposition in the mesangium. (Title: HIT 4’)

clips.name: Scene_3.4
clips.description: The overlay disappears and we see the immune complex damaging the glomerulus. Utilise comparison slider

clips.name: Scene_3.5
clips.description: We transition to the mucosal-associated lymphoid tissue, and pause. Click on plasma cell to release antibodies

clips.name: Scene_3.6
clips.description: Release of antibodies, and pause with APRIL in focus

clips.name: Scene_3.7
clips.description: Transition from APRIL

clips.name: Scene_3.9
clips.description: Reposition for drag sequence

clips.name: Scene_3.10
clips.description: Drag sequence

clips.name: Scene_3.11
clips.description: Transition to next drag sequence

clips.name: Scene_3.12
clips.description: Drag sequence

clips.name: Scene_3.13
clips.description: The camera pulls out and we see the plasma cell in circulation releasing Gd-IgA1 antibodies.

clips.name: Scene_3.14
clips.description: split 3 screen

clips.name: Scene_3.15
clips.description: Focus on kidneys. Flashing

clips.name: Scene_3.16
clips.description: Zigakibart enters. We pause and rotate.

clips.name: Scene_3.17
clips.description: APRIL comes in the scene and stops in place by Zigakibart.

clips.name: Scene_3.18
clips.description: Drag sequence.

clips.name: Scene_3.19
clips.description: BCMA and TACI receptors are shown to be unbound while Zigakibart is bound to APRIL.

clips.name: Scene_3.20
clips.description: Comparison slider.

clips.name: Scene_3.21
clips.description: Drag sequence.
